name: Janie Campbell
text: Not very good compared to my local pizza schmizza. Took over 30min for them to finish my 1 pizza and salad. 4 hours before closing, they were already out of romane lettuce but kindly substituted spinach. Pizza was flavorful but the crust was soggy.

name: S Trotter
text: When I visit Portland, I always swing buy to grab a pizza. Great toppings and crush made perfect.

name: Jeff Oppliger
text: Great pizza. If you like old style think crust pizza, you'll love Schmizza!  Plus, a full bar üç∏üçª

name: Vanessa P
text: This location makes good pizza, schmeezy bread, & wings. Good size location.

name: Laurie Holycross
text: Fun atmosphere! It has that keep Portland Weird vibe! I love their vegetarian pizza and Greek salad! My son also had their pepperoni roles...The waitress was friendly and took care of us in a timely manner! I'd come backüòä

name: Blaise
text: We walked in and came up to the bar and were asked if it was for here or to go. When I said here, the guy behind the pizza counter said to take a seat and someone would be out. We sat for about 5 minutes until our server came up and asked ‚Ä¶More

name: Mr. Wallace
text: I remember thier pizza being a little more appetizing. Burnt cheese. Burnt pepperoni. Burnt crust. But I did not order a burnt pizza Sam I am?

name: Sherrie Wright
text: Helpful, friendly, not too crowded. Good food and fair prices.

name: Mike Oppliger
text: Excellent Pizza. A must-go when I am in Portland.  Great staff at the Broadway location.

name: Amber Stowell
text: The first time I was here, the service was amazing.  I'm pretty sure it was the owner helping me.  Today...well...that guy wasn't there, and you could tell.  I shouldn't be told that the bill would've been higher if it weren't happy ‚Ä¶More

name: pushingfire
text: I'm right there with so many of the other reviewers, our bartender was the best. We came by on a slow night and our person greeted us, gave us that all important moment to gather ourselves, and gave perfect service. There was no sense of ‚Ä¶More

name: Veronica Vonhagel
text: Great food.

name: Serena A
text: Cute homey location. We'd been to another location and liked it so decided to try this one out. Great service and food came out quickly. Everything was fresh and very tasty. Prices are very competitive. I love that you can buy pizza by the ‚Ä¶More

name: Candice Altman
text: Loved it! I have been eating at various locations, starting at the original location in Hillsboro, for well over 20 years now and I absolutely love this location. The breadsticks were perfect, not tough or chewy like they can be sometimes. ‚Ä¶More

name: Icsis Cox
text: Only because it's food  seems like it went down hill & of course the atmosphere is not the same do to Covid-19. Service is still polite and good.

name: Devon Genson
text: Love the crust of the pizza at this schmizza. Great and friendly ladies that work there as well.

name: Sean Moshenko
text: Buffalo chicken strips on a healthy bed of spinach and blue cheese dressing on the sides. These folks know what they're doing.

name: Marcy Jane
text: Alfredo chicken was amazing! Delicious drinks as well! Awesome service too!

name: kevin dove
text: Pizza by the slice, and very good pizza at that. I've eaten there four times but I've gotten the Genoa pizza every time and it rocks! Quiet place to v.p. and still pays out once in a while. Customer service is pretty good, there is one gal ‚Ä¶More

name: kerri decker
text: Loved the food here! They were very busy in the kitchen but the staff was attentive and kept us updated.  The food had great presentation and tasted fantastic. Everyone in my group took a taste of each other's orders and each item was ‚Ä¶More

name: Shelia Riggs
text: Great pizza. Had a great drink with my meal. And is family friendly. Very pleased.

name: Jeff Crowl
text: Their Rustic Pie is something truly unique unto itself

name: Ryan Ryan
text:
Service was spot on and friendly (Thanks Ally!!).  Food was tasty and priced right.  Atmosphere is NE Portland spot on.  Glass top tables featuring Pez collections, Barbies, Star Wars....
Loved it all!!!

name: Dominic Ventura
text: Super clean, fun atmosphere, great food. An awesome pub for the price with a great bartender.  I got the bacon chicken ranch pizza and it was an awesome slice of pie.

name: Shannon Blaze
text: Great place to have a quick bite to eat and drink, then carrying on for the night in downtown Portland.

name: Angi Hoskins
text: Didnt actually try the pizza, but the salad and sandwiches were good.

name: Daniel Jensen
text: Pizza Schmizza is one of our favorite pizza places in Portland. This place did not disappoint; the service was friendly and the pizza creative. The beer selection has improved at Pizza Schmizza over the years, and is now as good or better than an average brew pub. Lots of specials mean you will probably pay less, too.

name: Jake Hillman
text:
Worst. Service. Ever.

...aaand stood waiting for someone to take my order for ~5 minutes, to be told ‚Ä¶More

name: Tiger Discs TV
text: Got our grub on before the blazer game.  Good eats and good drinks. Good prices too.

name: Mister Hjorth
text: Prices are a little steep, however I really enjoy the atmosphere here. It's a great place to grab a slice of pizza and watch whatever sporting event is on, as they have multiple TVs located around the dining area, including two right inside ‚Ä¶More

name: Katrina Abbott
text: They have different slices of pizza to choose from which the one I had was called "Olive Oil" it was good but not spectacular. They also have a menu you can order from with other foods  besides pizza.. They tave a very small video poker room with an ATM..

name: Mia Soliven
text: I like the pizza, but the wings. They're very tiny wings kind of like KFC wings, but they're expensive. I told my friends, I could have gone to KFC, would have gotten the same tiny wings, for half the price.

name: Anne-Liv Scott
text: Great ice cold beer and pizza by the slice options. The rewards system by earning points is funand the service is good as well, but if you want more then a slice, order a whole pizza instead. I find $38 for you and a friend to each have two slices and 2 beers is nothing but irritating.

name: Andy M.
text: Great little pizza spot. I would highly recommend

name: Charlene Hamilton
text: Good customer service. Taste pizza.

name: Patrice Simpson
text: Great service & delicious Don Ho pizza (canadian bacon & pineapple).

name: leanna medina
text: Was touched by an angel today.. an angel named Angie. Destiny? I think so. Next time I visit this location I hope to be helped by her!!

name: Justin McCarley
text: The heat was cranked up way too high. Our servers barely looked at us the entire time. We we're served the incorrect food. The tater tots were disgustingly bland. Like flavorless mush. They were unsalted, so we asked for salt and that ‚Ä¶More

name: Juli Muir
text: Great service and pizza.

name: S Peterson
text: Have loved Schmizza forever, pizza never disappoints, great beers on tap, chill atmosphere!

name: Curtis Partridge
text: Stopped in for lunch after my shift ended. I'd eaten their pie at the NW and DT locations when I was in a hurry with always good results. I had high hopes for a good meal, and wasn't disappointed. The only reason, I didn't give them five ‚Ä¶More

name: Ardent
text: I was checking out the reviews for this place to have a laugh and see if this restaurant has learned how to provide customer service to their customers and low and behold they're shi***** on their customers like usual; a year later and nothings changed, lol. GG

name: Tim Cockerham
text: Food was great, bartender was very friendly and the happy hour special was amazing!!!

name: Kristopher Osborne
text: Very disappointing. Location closes at 11pm on Friday night. Called at 9:55 to order a pizza to pick up. Started to place my order them was told to hold on and the person came back and said, "we only sell pizza by the slice after 10". ‚Ä¶More

name: Sandra Burton
text: Picked up a lunch order..food smelled delicious

name: Justus Porta
text: Service was terrible i waited 45 minutes for a BLT meanwhile the other people in my party got their pizza in about 15 minutes and finished their food. the waitress then gave me attitude when after 45 minutes I asked to just get a slice of ‚Ä¶More

name: Michael Rossi
text: Good pizza slices. Decent salads and a full bar. Great anytime!

name: Ryan Meyers
text: If I told you why the secret would be out

name: Sarah Butler
text: Good food, great service, fair price!

name: Daniel Jones
text: Food and drinks are great. Prices are not bad. But every time I go there the staff are rude. Seems like they all either hate their job or hate serving customers. I will no longer go to this establishment.
